Foundation Tips

Markup gotchas to watch out for.

DRAFT, last edited on 10/20/15 by JHN. Revisions: 1

Markup Notes

Only use rows with columns

If you nest a .row class within another row, Foundation applies the CSS margin: 0 -0.9375rem; to offset the column padding-left and right applied to a .column. If your horizontal alignments are off, thatâ€™s likely why.
